harkadventurer.model

Class Ability

  • java.lang.Object
    • harkadventurer.model.Ability
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Ability
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Ability-type objects store all information pertaining to an ability, including its name, base damage, dice, targeting and effect.
    Since:
    09/10/2017
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ability()
      Constructs an ability object with no name, effect and targeting, with a base damage of 0 and 0 2-sided dice.
      Ability(AbilityEffect inEffect, java.lang.String inName, TargetingStrategy inTarget, int inBase, int inNumDice, int inTypeDice)
      Constructs an ability object initialized with the given effect, name, target, base effect and dice.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the ability's base damage.
      AbilityEffect getEffect()
      Returns the ability's effect.

      Returns the ability's name.

      Returns the number of dice the ability rolls.

      Returns the ability's targeting strategy.

      Sets the number of dice to be rolled by the ability.

      Sets the ability's targeting logic.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ability

        public Ability()
        Constructs an ability object with no name, effect and targeting, with a base damage of 0 and 0 2-sided dice.

      • Ability

        public Ability(AbilityEffect inEffect,
       java.lang.String inName,
       TargetingStrategy inTarget,
       int inBase,
       int inNumDice,
       int inTypeDice)
        throws AbilityException
        Constructs an ability object initialized with the given effect, name, target, base effect and dice.
        Parameters:
        inEffect - The ability's effect
        inName - The ability's name
        inTarget - The ability's targeting logic
        inBase - The number to be added to the ability's dice roll
        inNumDice - The number of dice to be rolled
        inTypeDice - The type of dice to be rolled
        Throws:
        AbilityException - If any of the inputs are invalid

      • setNumDice

        public void setNumDice(int inNumDice)
                throws AbilityException
        Sets the number of dice to be rolled by the ability.
        Parameters:
        inNumDice - The desired number of dice
        Throws:
        AbilityException - If the input is negative

      • setTypeDice

        public void setTypeDice(int inTypeDice)
                 throws AbilityException
        Sets the type of dice to be rolled by the ability. A dice can have 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 20 or 100 faces.
        Parameters:
        inTypeDice - The number of faces on the ability's dice
        Throws:
        AbilityException - If the input is not a valid type of dice

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String containing the ability's information.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A String containing all the ability's classfields.
